section.p: Wavering like will-o’-the-wisps above a light haze, a ship’s lights gradually appear out of the night. A pallid mariner in a ragged, ancient-looking coat calls to you from the rail, saying that the ship is under a curse. Behind him stands a throng of sad-faced seamen.
‘We cannot put in to any port,’ the captain explains in a hollow voice, ‘but are doomed to sail the high seas for evermore.’

If you want to lift the curse you will need to
make a MAGIC roll at a Difficulty of 15 .
